mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO gsm_info ( gsm_key, area_code, farm_nickname, system_host, system_port, farm_nickname_i18n, category_id ) VALUES ( #{gsmKey}, #{areaCode}, #{farmNickname}, #{systemHost}, #{systemPort}, #{farmNicknameI18n}, #{categoryId} );
